channel.title: How can i make my rune altar work?
channel.description:
ok its pimpscape base
imtrying to get my rune altar work but nooe i hlepng....and i cant find here to put the code nd im not sure which code i think this is it
additem itemid,amount
something like that anyway if someone can help please post ill be on for 5-6 hours from now

item.title: How can i make my rune altar work?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

case 7128: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("MESSAGE"); addSkillXP((EXP*playerLevel[#]), #); addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(ANIMATION#); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;
Change MESSAGE to the message you want sent to the player. Change EXP to the experience you want the player to gain. Just to let you know, the exp given depends on their level. Change # to the skill number you want the exp added to. Change ITEMID to the ID of the item you want given, and AMOUNT to the amount of the item you want given. Change ANIMATION# to the animation you want to take place when the object is clicked on. Put this along some other cases I believe.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make my rune altar work?
